settings.header: Have you had your daily dose of vit today?
settings.subtitle: Whether you need a daily pick-me up or a little sleep support, our products are developed with the end goal in mind. Optimally-dosed, highly bioavailable formulas means you can see and feel results that set you on a path to better health.1

settings.title: Walking on Sunshine
settings.textdata: “These little softgels have helped boost my mood and keep me in a positive head space during all the chaos of everyone coming back to work since covid. I suffer from anxiety and depression and this has helped”
settings.name: Amber
